A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible treatment of Luke Skywalker. Bad pacing. Bad undertstanding of how the star wars lore and canon work in previously made movies\, such as but not limited to the mary sue character Rey. No training no failing no character growth. Crapped on other characters such as Poe and Ackbar to fuel a story that didnt make sense. Im glad the fan base has EU novels and comics because they need to do alot of work to save the franchise with TROS
